name: ESI Group
bossPosition: President Product Operations / Chief Operating Officer ESI Group
goal: The ESI Group specialise in Material Physics and are innovators in Virtual Prototyping addressing the need for products and processes which are both smart and autonomous, thus supporting industry in digital transformation.
interests: Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: The ESI Group work with various EU Institutions and Agencies, and would like to meet with Ministers/Commissioners with a view to creating a common hybrid digital twin platform for the physical dismantling phases of the nuclear decommissioning process by creating a special interest group of 10 members comprised of experts specialising in nuclear decommissioning and dismantling.
